name: Horny Honey
description:
Tired of your daily routine? Do you want to spend time pleasantly and with benefit for the brain? Tired of challenging puzzles that rush you? Or maybe you just love anime?

If you answered "yes" to at least 1 of these questions, then Horny Honey is a great choice to expand the collection in your library! We present you a fascinating hentai puzzle with a wide variety of pictures, in which everyone will find something to their liking!



Features of the game:
- Fascinating pictures
- Meditative gameplay
- 6 girls and over 20 levels with them!
- Relaxing soundtrack
